group_1.textLeft: Since we’re giving these chocolates to the kids,
I want to use a design that’ll make them happy.

group_1.textRight: Making the chocolates big@would be enough to satisfy them.

group_1.textLeft: Well, you're right, but...
I’d really like it if we could wow our patrons
with a beautiful or cute design when they see it.

group_1.textRight: Then why don’t we make a chocolate@that you’d consider cute?

group_1.textLeft: What?@[chara:301651:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301651:cheek_0][chara:301651:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301651:lipSynch_1]But...um...
...In that case...
...Can we make chocolate bears?
...[wait:0.8][chara:301651:cheek_1:motion_100][chara:301651:lipSynch_1]S-scratch that!
I’m sorry! It's a bad idea!@Just forget about it!

group_1.textRight: Why?

group_1.textLeft: I-it's―@Because...!

group_1.textRight: Let's make chocolate bears.@Do you know how?

group_1.textLeft: No...I’ve never done it before.
If I had to guess... You pour the chocolate@into both halves of the mold,
and then you combine them and@let them solidify, I think?
Hmm... So, if we use this, and do that...

group_1.textRight: The round parts are making me think@of snowmen more than bears.

group_1.textLeft: Ugh... You're right.

group_1.textCenter: Hello! How are you two doing?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you must be Manaka's father!

group_1.textRight: Mm-hmm, that's right.
Now, if you use this to make a smaller sphere,@it'll have more of a bear shape.
...See?

group_1.textLeft: Oh my gosh...!@[chara:301651:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301651:cheek_0][chara:301651:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_0][chara:301651:lipSynch_1]It looks just like a bear!

group_1.textRight: Doesn't it, though?
There are some tricky parts to shaping chocolate.
I'll give you a demonstration, so watch carefully.

group_1.textLeft: Please do! And thank you so much!
Phew! All of the chocolate-making is done,@and so is the wrapping!

group_1.textRight: Yes, excellent work!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you so much!
We made so many chocolates.
I think we'll be ready for any@number of guests tomorrow.

group_1.textRight: Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: I hope Himika will have fun at the bazaar!

group_1.textRight: I'm sure she'll be pleased when she finds out
how hard you worked for her sake.

group_1.textLeft: That's...gonna be really embarrassing...
...Oh! Everyone's here!

group_1.textRight: How did the chocolate turn out?

group_1.textLeft: We just finished everything!

group_1.textRight: Woah! This is great!@You really made that much?!

group_1.textLeft: We did.

group_1.textRight: [chara:303050:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]These chocolate bears are adorable!
I'd be over the moon if I got one of these!

group_1.textLeft: I hope the kids will feel the same!
By the way, Konomi,@what are those little bouquets for?
You ended up making a lot, too...

group_1.textRight: Oh, I just wanted to make a thank-you@gift to anyone who donates.
I talked with Asuka and Sasara, and we decided to@make mini-bouquets to show our gratitude!

group_1.textLeft: That would be a lovely gift for our donors!

group_1.textRight: With your chocolates and our mini-bouquets,
we're all set to make our visitors happy!
My students at the dojo have traveled all@around the city to promote the event.
I'm certain we'll have a great turnout!

group_1.textLeft: Yes...!
